Detailed Description

Class that manages authentication of a DAZ 3D user account.

This class allows plug-ins and scripts to authenticate a DAZ 3D user account and acquire a user token for use with official DAZ 3D web services.

Member Function Documentation

bool DzAuthenticationMgr::authenticateUser (  )  [slot]

This function will attempt to authenticate a DAZ 3D user account. If no account information has been entered by the user, a dialog will be displayed to securely acquire the username and password to be authenticated.

Returns:
True if the user was authenticated
QString DzAuthenticationMgr::getUserToken (  )  [slot]
Returns:
A string representation of the user authentication token.
bool DzAuthenticationMgr::isAuthenticated (  )  [slot]
Returns:
True if the user is authenticated
void DzAuthenticationMgr::logout (  )  [slot]

Invalidates any existing authentication.
